# Course Registration

-   [ ] If you are in [*PSB4934* ]{style="color: darkorange;"}: skip the next step.
-   [ ] If you're [*not*]{style="color: green;"} in PSB4934: Fill out [PSY4911]{style="color: darkorange;"} form and complete 2 training topics i.e., required by Psychology:
    -   [ ] [FERPA Basics](https://privacy.ufl.edu/privacy-training/ferpa-basics-and-ferpa-for-faculty/)
    -   [ ] [Maintaining a Safe and Respectful Campus](https://learn-and-grow.hr.ufl.edu/courses-registration/compliance-training/)

# Orientation to High-Performance Computing on HiPerGator3 (HPG)

-   [ ]  [Go to HiPerGator3 New User Training i.e.,req by UF RC](https://help.rc.ufl.edu/doc/New_user_training)
-   [ ]  [Complete the required Coursera training](https://coursera.org/groups/hipergator-account-training-ywszh/invitation)
-   [ ]   [Go to the UFRC Getting Started page](https://help.rc.ufl.edu/doc/Getting_Started)
-   [ ]   [Bookmark the UFRC Help and Documentation page in your browser](https://help.rc.ufl.edu/doc/UFRC_Help_and_Documentation)
